meanings.definition: To compare in order to show differences.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys contrasting colors when painting.
meanings.sent2: I am contrasting two books for my school project.
meanings.sent3: The chef was contrasting the flavors in a playful way.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice contrasting with the loud music.
meanings.sent5: The artist used contrasting shades to create a striking image.

meanings.definition: Strikingly different; opposite in nature or character.
meanings.sent2: The warm sun and cool breeze created a contrasting feeling.
meanings.sent3: The movie had a contrasting plot twist that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor was contrasting with the chaos around him.
meanings.sent5: The old building stood in contrasting beauty against the modern skyline.
